interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Brave
Review Date: 2019/12/20
Store: Kelly MacDonald  (Actor),     Billy Connolly  (Actor),     Mark Andrews  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment, All Disney Titles
Product Description: ['Pixar Animation Studios, the creator of TOY STORY 3, whisks you away on an astonishing adventure to an ancient land full of mystery and tradition. Bursting with heart, unforgettable characters and Pixar\'s signature humor, BRAVE is "a rousing, gorgeously animated good time," raves Peter Travers of Rolling Stone. Take a heroic journey with Merida, a skilled archer and headstrong daughter of King Fergus and Queen Elinor. Determined to carve her own path in life, Merida defies an age-old custom sacred to the unruly and uproarious lords of the land. When Merida\'s actions inadvertently unleash chaos in the kingdom, she must harness all of her skills and resources -- including her clever and mischievous triplet brothers -- to undo a beastly curse before it\'s too late, and discover the meaning of true bravery.']
Average Rating: 4.8

Tangled
Mandy Moore  (Actor),     Zachary Levi  (Actor),     Nathan Greno  (Director),     Byron Howard  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment, All Disney Titles
['Disney presents a new twist on one of the most hilarious and hair-raising tales ever told. Your whole family will get tangled up in the fun, excitement and adventure of this magical motion picture.When the kingdom\'s most wanted - and most charming - bandit Flynn Rider hides in a mysterious tower, the last thing he expects to find is Rapunzel, a spirited teen with an unlikely superpower - 70 feet of magical golden hair! Together, the unlikely duo sets off on a fantastic journey filled with surprising heroes, laughter and suspense.Let your hair down and get ready to cheer for "Tangled." Bursting with never-before-seen bonus features, it\'s even more enchanting on Blu-ray Hi-Def.']

profile:
**User Profile Summary Updated:**

- **Preferred Genres:** Comedy, Drama, Romance, Animation  
- **Mood:** Cheerful, Passionate  
- **Content Interests:** Enthusiastic about light-hearted narratives with emotional resonance, particularly romantic themes. Displays a notable fondness for animated films integrating humor and adventure, as well as heartfelt storytelling.  
- **Viewing Habits:** Consistently enjoys romantic comedies and dramas, with an increasing appreciation for animated features that provide both entertainment and emotional depth. Actively rates films with high enthusiasm, especially family-friendly narratives.  
- **Formats:** Prefers convenient digital access through streaming services and e-readers but also values physical formats like DVDs that enhance the viewing experience.  
- **Engagement Style:** Exhibits great excitement for films, sharing favorites with high ratings, and actively praises engaging character dynamics and storytelling; recently awarded a perfect score to an animated film.  
- **Key Features Valued:** Prioritizes high-quality storytelling, relatable characters, and narratives that evoke joy and warmth.  
- **Purchase Behavior:** Willing to invest in emotionally impactful films, consistently giving high ratings to preferred titles while remaining discerning about adaptations and variations across formats.  

Overall, the user demonstrates a sustained passion for entertaining, feel-good stories that inspire positive reviews, along with a blossoming appreciation for animated films that resonate deeply with their preferences.
